channel.title: CronicPks 24/7 RscServer With Great Costums + Staff
channel.description:
[b]Hello Mopar Community,
I Have A Question, Are You Sick of looking for a new RSC server? Sick of finding a pro RSC server and finding thats its been shut off for months or there website aint working anymore?
Well Cronicpk's is online, and here to Stay!
We are a new server, and would love to have you join our community.
Owner - Cole
Moderator - Mod Justin
Pmods - Papa & Dip [b] Tell either one of these that your new im sure they will try there best to help you [/b]
Below is a few Details about CronicPKs.
We are Running on a Dedi - The Server is online 24/7
Wilderness is P2P&F2P
All Skilling works ( Agility Removed )
Wizard teleporting NPC Gambling NPC PK Area NPC ( Pay to tele, and last person standing gets all the cash that people payed)
Black Dragons / Red Dragons / King Black Dragon - All at Alter tele.
Server has no lag at all
Combat system with no bugs
All Mage spell's work correctly ( Correct casting timer and range )
Perfect Economy, Where just missing you :).[/b]
< Screenies Will be posted later >
Give CronicPks A Shot
Download Link
Download our Latest Updated Client here:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=535OMN0V
or
http://uppit.com/v/FHQHFH82
Last updated on: October 25, 6:18pm
Thanks, enjoy
Check My Signature for forums :D
